sections.title: Divine Assessor (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Divine Assessor class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Spellcasting (Divine Assessor)
sections.description: Divine assessor levels 2-6 stack with existing divine spellcasting class for spells per day and caster level determination.

sections.title: Bypass Ward (Ex) (Divine Assessor)
sections.description: Allows picking locks on magically sealed doors and disabling magical traps temporarily, with bonuses to Disable Device checks.

sections.title: Appraising Eye (Ex) (Divine Assessor)
sections.description: Provides bonuses to Appraise checks and allows faster appraisal of items with a penalty option.

sections.title: Bottomless Bag (Su) (Divine Assessor)
sections.description: Transforms ordinary containers into temporary bags of holding that cannot be overloaded or ruptured.

sections.title: Eloquent Bargainer (Ex) (Divine Assessor)
sections.description: Grants bonuses to Diplomacy when offering bribes and to Charisma checks for compelling bound creatures in planar binding spells.

sections.title: Access the Vault (Su) (Divine Assessor)
sections.description: Summons temporary copies of non-magical or magical items from a divine repository, with items automatically returning after duration expires.

sections.title: Vault Jump (Sp) (Divine Assessor)
sections.description: Creates portal through divine vault functioning as dimension door or word of recall, causing nausea upon arrival.
